tool_description: Monitors taxpayer profiles for compliance issues, risk indicators, and regulatory requirements, generating appropriate alerts and flags.

taxpayer_id.description: Unique taxpayer identification number to monitor

risk_threshold.description: Risk level threshold for flagging (low, medium, high)

error_messages: Taxpayer not found: No taxpayer found with the specified ID
Invalid risk threshold: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid monitoring scope: One or more specified compliance areas are not recognized
Insufficient data: Not enough profile data available for comprehensive compliance monitoring
Monitoring system unavailable: Compliance monitoring service is temporarily unavailable
usage: Provide taxpayer ID and optionally specify monitoring scope and risk threshold. Tool analyzes profile data against compliance rules and generates appropriate flags.

recommended_actions.description: Recommended actions to address compliance issues
